content:
I've been meaning to organize my music festival photos, but I haven't gotten around to it yet. I did use the auto mode on my phone's camera, but I didn't try any specific settings. I just pointed and shot! Maybe I'll try playing around with the camera settings next time.

And yeah, I've played around with Google Photos' editing features, but I haven't tried the automatic video creation yet. I'll have to check that out. It sounds like a cool way to create a quick recap of my festival experience.
